name: alexa-nationalanthems-skill
description: An Alexa skill for the Amazon Echo.

scripts.build:prod: npm run lint && npm run build -- --mode production
scripts.update-schema: ts-node ./bin/update-schema.ts --lang de --file ./models/de-DE.json && ts-node ./bin/update-schema.ts --lang en --file ./models/en-US.json && cp ./models/en-US.json ./models/en-GB.json && cp ./models/en-US.json ./models/en-AU.json && cp ./models/en-US.json ./models/en-CA.json && cp ./models/en-US.json ./models/en-IN.json
scripts.convert-assets: rsvg-convert -w 108 -o assets/icon108.png assets/icon.svg && rsvg-convert -w 512 -o assets/icon512.png assets/icon.svg
scripts.create-s3-bucket: aws s3 ls s3://alexa-nationalanthems-skill > /dev/null 2>&1 || aws s3 mb s3://alexa-nationalanthems-skill --region eu-west-1
